metadata.description: Sherlock Holmes confronts the split persona of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde!  Holmes and Watson seek to uncover the terrible secret that is plaguing their good friend, the esteemed Dr. Jekyll.  When word gets out that the doctor is allowing the deranged Mr. Hyde free access to his wealth, Holmes realizes that something, no matter how improbable, is wrong.  But is the value of a friendship worth more than life itself?  Holmes must make that decision. Collects issues 1-2.
metadata.name: Sherlock Holmes: Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Holmes
